channel.title: Changing Max Cape stats doesnt work?
channel.description:
Hello Mopar,
I have recently changed my Max Cape stats but it just doesnt work, here a picture for the people that dont understand my bad english:p [url=http://www.imghack.se/94355][img]http://cdn.imghack.se/medium/8e4764000baa05c5242dee8e54a4d5d3.png[/img][/url]
(Click on the picture to make it bigger) AS you can see i have the stats from max Cape set, its the correct item ID and everything, compiled, restarted did this like 1000times and the stats wont change, what am i forgetting or doing wrong?
Thanks, Remco

@remcowp wrote:

I know lol, i did that.

item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“remcowp, post:1, topic:517510”]AS you can see i have the stats from max Cape set, its the correct item ID and everything, compiled, restarted did this like 1000times and the stats wont change, what am i forgetting or doing wrong?

Thanks, Remco[/quote]
Just to let you know, u don’t need to compile if u edit a .cfg file.
